name: SW Snowboarding
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Welcome to the open mountain, and get ready to experience the ride of your life. Conquer extreme peak conditions, create your own paths in the back country or compete with other riders in the terrain parks. The choice is always yours. Ride in a world where your friends are always around. Do your own runs on mountains populates by other gamers, or join them for a quick session. Its guaranteed fun anytime, all the time. Express yourself through tricks, riding styles and highly customizable avatars. Use the intuitive dual analog controls to pull a huge variety of tricks to express that style. See you on the mountain. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
